Sentencas: A two-dimensional mathematical model for a planar SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) is constructed.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The distribution of the chemical species, the temperature and the performance (power) and the current density were calculated using a single-unit model with double channels of co-flow pattern.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The finite volume method was employed for the calculation.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The method was based on the fundamental conservation laws of continuity, momentum, energy and mass.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The equations are implemented in FORTRAN language.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The effects of several heat sources and flow rates on the calculated results were also investigated.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The reference SOFC polarization curve has been calculated by imposing a uniform temperature of 800 K, a pressure equal to 1 atm; H-2 and O-2 molar fractions equal to 0.97 and 0.21 respectively.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: Results of temperature, chemical species distributions, performance and efficiency under several heat sources are shown and discussed.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: At a current density of about 23500 A/m(2), the power densities under all sources and chemical sources reached their maximums of 12965 W/m(2) and 16209 W/m(2) (i.e. 25% lower) respectively.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: However the temperature increment in the anode is analyzed toward all sources and chemical reaction.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model

Sentencas: The temperature maximum values for each heat source type reached 1005.81 K and 984.69 K respectively.
Titulo: Study of species, temperature distributions and the solid oxide fuel cells performance in a 2-D model
